TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DockPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示在某个停靠容器内公开其停靠属性的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that expose their dock properties within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停靠容器是允许的控件的排列子元素，水平和垂直两个位置相对于停靠容器和容器内的其他元素的边界。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. 根据其当前的 z 顺序; 彼此相对停靠控件中的较大其 z 顺序放置功能，进一步位于从停靠容器的指定边缘。Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement, the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container. 请参阅[UI 自动化客户端的控件模式映射](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)有关的可以实现此控件模式的控件示例。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern. 不支持停靠容器的任何属性或可能停靠在停靠容器内当前控件旁边的任何的控件属性。 does not support any properties of the docking container or any properties of controls that might be docked adjacent to the current control within the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As DockPattern.DockPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含控件模式中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用来获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As DockPattern.DockPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含此控件模式的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须从与以获取当前值的引用。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果获得使用，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用来获取一个属性，以前使用指定的缓存的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly DockPositionProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 此外可以从检索此属性或属性。This property can also be retrieved from the or properties. 默认值为 。The default value is . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，表示支持的控件的当前停靠位置获取值。In the following example, a value is obtained representing the current dock position for a control that supports . remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 模式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]传递给方法诸如若要从指定检索控件模式感兴趣的。The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式的均来自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetDockPosition(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition dockPosition) cil managed

param.name: dockPosition
param.span: 相对于停靠容器边界和容器内的其他元素的停靠位置。

span.span: The dock position relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

summary.span: 将 停靠在停靠容器内请求的 处。

span.span: Docks the at the requested within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停靠容器是允许的控件的排列子元素，水平和垂直两个位置相对于停靠容器和容器内的其他元素的边界。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，表示支持 DockPattern 控件模式的控件具有其`dockPosition`修改。In the following example, an representing a control that supports the DockPattern control pattern has its `dockPosition` modified. [!code-csharp[UIADockPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIADockPattern_snip/CSharp/UIADockPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIADockPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIADockPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIADockPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIADockPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIADockPattern_snip/CSharp/UIADockPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIADockPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIADockPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIADockPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

exception.span: 当控件无法执行请求的停靠样式时。

span.span: When a control is not able to execute the requested dock style.
